data.name: Dead and Buried II
data.description:
Dead and Buried II is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter set in a supernatural western world. Grab your six-shooters and choose from multiple gamemodes. Compete against real players online to see who the best gunslinger is or play cooperatively versus the undead horde! The game is a sequel to the popular Dead and Buried released on Rift and GO.

Features:
- Competitive Modes: battle online in free-roaming Deathmatch or cover-based Shootout.
- Cooperative Modes: band together in free-roaming Survival or stationary Horde.
- Duel it out: Go 1v1 in a last-man-standing Quickdraw match.
- Multiplayer Bots: never wait for players again! Bots will fill the game.
- Portable: with Quest, take the action on the go.
- Social: make new friends in the Town and spin up matches together.
- Weaponry: six-shooters, grenade launchers, and more!

changelog.change_log:
Version 2.0.8396

* Survival/Horde
    * Fixed issue where players could sometimes not pickup orbs in Survival
    * Fixed issue where zombies would skate/slide/jitter
    * Fixed issue where zombies would stack up in a single spot in Horde
    * Zombies that cannot engage the player will despawn themselves after a short period of time
* Quickdraw
    * Fixed issue where players could not join the match late
    * Better randomization of duel participants
    * Fixed issue where holding the controller in a certain position would give a player an unfair advantage
    * Fixed issue where the mini scoreboard would not properly update when there were more than 4 players
    * Fixed issue where players that joined late were able to draw their weapon early
* Alpine Deathmatch
    * Adjusted several spawn points to address player facing
    * Adjusted several weapon spawns to make them easier to pick up
* General
    * Fixed several cases that could result in invisible players and/or bots
    * Added indicator next to player's name when they are speaking to other game modes
    * Fixed issue where traps would sometimes not land correctly
    * Added a second trap type
    * Miscellaneous other fixes and performance improvements

Version 2.0.7534

Dead and Buried 2 has been Reloaded with new free content!

* New Cooperative Modes: band together in free-roaming Survival or classic stationary Horde.
	
* Duel it out: Go 1v1 in a last-man-standing Quickdraw match.

* New Shootout and Deathmatch levels to play with your friends.

* New weapons for all game modes.
	
* New player characters to choose and play as.

* Version 1.0.4749
* Fixed missing player names in Town

* Version 1.0.4290
* Added support for some upcoming Oculus features
* Minor bug fixes

* Version 1.0.2855
* Added new Locomotion Settings such as smooth turning and handedness
* Added a new Tutorial with a simple Shooting Range
* Added support for launching Private Rooms
    * When checked, a private instance for all the players launching from an event will be created
    * Private Rooms have the option of disabling bots if there are enough ready players on each side
* Added support for Oculus Party Chat (if the party has at least two online members)
    * The party is given a private Town instance so they can easily meet up
    * Players can choose to use either Oculus Party Chat or in-game chat (see Settings Menu)
* Added new music to several of the levels
* Added target name to the kill indicator
* Added support for muting specific players via the Pause Menu
    * Can see who is actively talking
    * NOTE - Muting only lasts for the current game session
* Re-balanced Shootout levels
    * Made adjustments to cover
    * Moved pickup weapons so they are easier to reach
    * Fixed several exploits
* Numerous bug fixes and improvements
    * Fixed several issues that could lead to broken events, invulnerable bots, and invisible players
    * Fixed several host drop issues that could lead to non-responsive bots
    * Added auto disconnect for players that are inactive
    * Added minimum and maximum avatar heights to avoid extreme squats and super tall players
    * Improved player and weapon models getting culled out when close to camera
    * Improved bullet accuracy
    * Improved Dynamite physics and throwing
    * Fixed bug where Dynamite would explode prematurely after more than 10 were used
    * Thrown pickup items will now inherit player velocity
    * Added a new optional tunneling vignette when moving or turning
    * Can optionally disable laser sights
    * Many more fixes, polish, and optimizations
